tips.title: Customize your Dashboard
tips.description: Click the 'Customize' button next to quick access to select up to 8 most frequently used functions.

tips.title: Add events to calendar
tips.description: Press the 'Add to Calendar' button on Events page to add event directly to your personal calendar.

tips.title: Track your points
tips.description: Check the 'Activity Log' page to see how you earn points through contributions, tasks and events.

tips.title: Earn badges
tips.description: Collect points for activities in the congregation and unlock special badges. See the Badges page for all available badges.

tips.title: Donate to projects
tips.description: Support congregation projects through the Projects page. Your contributions are automatically calculated toward the target amount.

tips.title: Check prayer times
tips.description: Today's prayer times are displayed on the dashboard. For monthly overview click on 'Prayer Calendar'.

tips.title: Contact sellers
tips.description: In the Shop, click on an item and use the 'Contact Seller' button to send a direct message.

tips.title: Ask the Imam
tips.description: Ask the Imam questions anonymously or publicly through the 'Ask Imam' page. Answers can be archived for future reference.
